laboratory_examinations.findings: The appendix is dilated measuring up to 1.4 cm and fluid filled, with surrounding inflammatory change. An appendicolith is seen lodged within the base. There is no evidence of perforation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: There is a 1.6 x 1.6 x 2.0-cm nodule within the medial limb of the right adrenal gland, which is new from ___. A hypodensity in the anterior portion of segment 4a/b is unchanged from ___.
